Projects

Below you will find a list of personal (or internship-related) projects that I've worked on. Not all have been completed. Not all are up to my current standard of development. However, it's a log of my curiousity, interest in different technologies, and improvement in a quickly changing, exciting field.

Hill of Cards

Hill of Cards


March 2017

I do more than just software projects! I like to dip my toes in as many things as possible including movie making! This video was just a quick campaign announcement for Denison student government...I threw it together rather quickly, but I enjoyed making it.

buDUget

buDUget


March 2017

buDUget is a budgeting platform built specifically for Denison University's budgeting needs. Being a part of Denison's finance committee, Bobby built the tool to help streamline the budgeting process. Unfortunately, the committee likes to stay in the dark ages with spreadsheets.

Abroad Blog

Abroad Blog


February 2017 - May 2017

This was a semester-long project. It started off as a normal blog like the one on this site, but it eventually grew to much more.

Catering Calendar

Catering Calendar


January 2016 - May 2016

Project never made it off the ground. Denison administration and catering dragged their feet, and now the school is without a wonderful tool...

Congresstributions

Congresstributions


May 2016

Congresstributions was a fun little tool to keep Congresspeople accountable by placing their largest contributors after their names so readers had an idea about their history. Unfortunately, I didn't know about APIs (or didn't want to use them...) at the time, so it's been left behind. I tried to update...

Tenable Product Page

Tenable Product Page


June 2016 - August 2016

Unfortunately, I don't have an original image of the changes that I made because it's since been updated for Tenable's Tenable.io release. However, it looked great, I assure you.

Tenable Product Selector

Tenable Product Selector


June 2016 - August 2016

The link within is the best way to discover what this was for. Fun little project at Tenable that gets to be used by many!

Denison Subreddit Reskin

Denison Subreddit Reskin


July 2016

This was a quick afternoon project.
